alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:59PM CDT until June 10 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Webster County in north central Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reform, or 8 miles north of Ackerman, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sherwood around 410 PM CDT. Mathiston around 420 PM CDT. Maben around 430 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
